meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to 1/60th of a minute.
meanings.sent1: She waited for a few seconds before crossing the street.
meanings.sent2: The stopwatch counted the seconds as the race began.
meanings.sent3: The seconds seemed to slow down as she anxiously waited for the results.
meanings.sent4: In the seconds before the decision was announced, the tension in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The seconds ticked by like tiny heartbeats, each one filled with anticipation.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to two in a series.
meanings.sent1: He finished in seconds place in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The twins were born just seconds apart.
meanings.sent3: It was a close race, but she managed to secure the seconds spot on the podium.
meanings.sent4: The seconds runner-up received a silver medal for his performance.
meanings.sent5: She was thrilled to come in seconds in the spelling bee, just behind the champion.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is next after the first in order.
meanings.sent1: After the winner crossed the finish line, the seconds runner quickly followed.
meanings.sent2: The seconds in line eagerly awaited their turn to enter the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The seconds in command were ready to take over if needed.
meanings.sent4: She was the seconds to arrive at the party, just after her best friend.
meanings.sent5: The seconds in line for the concert tickets were excited to get their hands on them.
